entry.title: New Board Members van der Pas and Stotzer

link.title: New Board Members van der Pas and Stotzer

entry.content:
The OpenMP ARB welcomes Ruud van der Pas and Eric Stotzer to its Board of Directors.

The post New Board Members van der Pas and Stotzer appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: The OpenMP ARB welcomes Ruud van der Pas and Eric Stotzer to its Board of Directors.

entry.title: OpenMP Example Book Survey
entry.content:
If you have used our OpenMP API Examples book, take our survey to tell us how we can improve it.

The post OpenMP Example Book Survey appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: If you have used our OpenMP API Examples book, take our survey to tell us how we can improve it.

entry.title: New Python Subcommittee, and Anaconda joins OpenMP ARB

link.title: New Python Subcommittee, and Anaconda joins OpenMP ARB

entry.content:
Anaconda has joined the OpenMP ARB, and the OpenMP ARB has formed a new Python subcommittee to add Python as the fourth supported language in the OpenMP API.

The post New Python Subcommittee, and Anaconda joins OpenMP ARB appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: Anaconda has joined the OpenMP ARB, and the OpenMP ARB has formed a new Python subcommittee to add Python as the fourth supported language in the OpenMP API.

entry.title: IWOMP 2026
entry.content:
IWOMP 2026 Join us for IWOMP 2026 at Austrian Scientific Computing (ASC) at TU Wien in Vienna (Austria)

The post IWOMP 2026 appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: IWOMP 2026 Join us for IWOMP 2026 at Austrian Scientific Computing (ASC) at TU Wien in Vienna (Austria)

entry.title: OpenMP ARB Releases Technical Report 14
entry.content:
The OpenMP® ARB has released Technical Report 14, a preview of version 6.1 of the OpenMP API, which will be released in 2026.

The post OpenMP ARB Releases Technical Report 14 appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: The OpenMP® ARB has released Technical Report 14, a preview of version 6.1 of the OpenMP API, which will be released in 2026.

entry.title: Supercomputing 2025
entry.content:
November 2025
Visit us in booth 911, attend our BOF, and attend our two tutorials at SC25 in St. Louis. See videos and more.

The post Supercomputing 2025 appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: November 2025 Visit us in booth 911, attend our BOF, and attend our two tutorials at SC25 in St. Louis. See videos and more.

entry.title: IWOMP 2025
entry.content:
IWOMP 2025 will be held at the UNC Charlotte campus in North Carolina, Oct 1 – Oct. 3, 2025.

The post IWOMP 2025 appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: IWOMP 2025 will be held at the UNC Charlotte campus in North Carolina, Oct 1 – Oct. 3, 2025.

entry.title: NextSilicon joins the OpenMP
entry.content:
June 10, 2025 — NextSilicon has joined the OpenMP ARB, a group of leading hardware and software vendors and research organizations creating the standard for the most popular shared-memory parallel programming model in use today.

The post NextSilicon joins the OpenMP appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: June 10, 2025 — NextSilicon has joined the OpenMP ARB, a group of leading hardware and software vendors and research organizations creating the standard for the most popular shared-memory parallel programming model in use today.

entry.title: ISC 2025
entry.content:
ISC 2025 will be held in Hamburg, Germany June 10-13, bringing together over 3,500 international attendees to exchange ideas and knowledge.

The post ISC 2025 appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: ISC 2025 will be held in Hamburg, Germany June 10-13, bringing together over 3,500 international attendees to exchange ideas and knowledge.

entry.title: Status of OpenMP API 6.0 Implementations
entry.content:
First implementations of OpenMP 6.0 features are now available in Intel® and GCC compilers.

The post Status of OpenMP API 6.0 Implementations appeared first on OpenMP.
entry.summary: First implementations of OpenMP 6.0 features are now available in Intel® and GCC compilers.
